xaxis_multiplier.description: The multiplication factor for the X-axis (horizontal)

yaxis_multiplier.description: The multiplication factor for the Y-axis (vertical)

line_attributes.description: Scatter/Line attributes passed directly to Matplotlib

legend.description: Short description of the data, to be added to the plot

grid.description: If we should draw grid lines or not for the plot

xaxis_log.description: If X-axis (horizontal) should be in log-scale

yaxis_log.description: If Y-axis (vertical) should be in log-scale
